page.title: 18Kingsway Primary School
page.content: The building was opened in 1911 as a boys secondary school.It later became a junior school and in 1980 was reorganised to form a primary school. There are 248 children between the ages of 5 and 12 years on roll organised into 9 classes.Teaching staff consists of headmaster and 9 assistant teachers.Non-teaching staff number 15(including 9 part-time). The{curriculum}consists of:mathematics language,science,environmental studies religious education,music,art and craft,physical education and cookery. The school day begins at{8.55 a.m.}and ends at{3.20p.m.(infants)}or{3.30 p.m. {(juniors).}There are "breaks" of 15 minutes(morning) and 10 min(afternoon) Lunch break lasts from noon until 1.05 p.m. Extra-curricular activities include:football and netball teams, choir,chess and guitar clubs etc.
